# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been highly valued by many satisfied customers. Given its quality and features, it's worth more than $100 to us, but considering your needs and preferences, we're willing to extend this exclusive offer to you. We propose to sell the product to you for $120. This price reflects the value we believe the product holds for you while ensuring we maintain a fair profit margin. We're confident you'll find the product to be worth every penny. Looking forward to your positive response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $120. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $120
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $100
